name: Darumaka
flavorText:
When its internal fire is burning, it
cannot calm down and it runs around.
When the fire diminishes, it falls asleep.

previous.name: Krookodile
previous.flavorText:
They never allow prey to escape.
Their jaws are so powerful, they can
crush the body of an automobile.

next.name: Darmanitan
next.flavorText:
Its internal fire burns at 2,500° F,
making enough power that it can
destroy a dump truck with one punch.
next.formDescription: Forms have different stats and types.  If Darmanitan's ability is zen mode, it changes to Zen Mode in battle if it ends a turn below 50% HP, and back to Standard Mode if it ends a turn at 50% HP or above, leaves battle, or loses its ability.
